comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: This website (PDF) says: The North Albanians are divided into tribes or clans; those to the north being grouped under the designation of Malissori, or men of the Black Mountains, including the Clementi, Castrati, Hoti, Skreli, and other tribes; ... A New York Times article about the Malissori in conflict with the Turks is from 1 August 1911.
